rows.label: bf11130100_0010
rows.name: Erm, Your Highness?

rows.label: bf11130100_0020
rows.name: Just Adel is fine. What is it?

rows.label: bf11130100_0030
rows.name: The going after Metsu thing... Could it wait a few days?

rows.label: bf11130100_0040
rows.name: Oh? Is there something you need to do first?

rows.label: bf11130100_0050
rows.name: I... Well, yes.

rows.label: bf11130100_0060
rows.name: You see... Laura-sama seek the whereabouts of her mother.

rows.label: bf11130100_0070
rows.name:
Unfortunately, she has her mercenary duties to perform.
Therefore, I often go out and conduct these searches myself.

rows.label: bf11130100_0080
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: bf11130100_0085
rows.name: Then, you've found her?

rows.label: bf11130100_0090
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf11130100_0095
rows.name:
With all that happened yesterday,
I did not have the opportunity to say...

rows.label: bf11130100_0100
rows.name:
My lady, your mother is currently residing
in a small hamlet called Trigo.

rows.label: bf11130100_0110
rows.name: Trigo...

rows.label: bf11130100_0120
rows.name: That's on the edge of Gula.

rows.label: bf11130100_0130
rows.name:
Superbian and Shiyan forces clash out 
there frequently. It's very dangerous.

rows.label: bf11130100_0140
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: bf11130100_0150
rows.name:
Right, no time to waste.
Let us head out there!

rows.label: bf11130100_0160
rows.name:
What?!
But what about your mission?!

rows.label: bf11130100_0170
rows.name: You don't want to see your mother?

rows.label: bf11130100_0180
rows.name: Of... Of course, but...

rows.label: bf11130100_0190
rows.name:
Then let's go! Metsu hasn't hit that
part of the world yet.

rows.label: bf11130100_0200
rows.name: It's as good a place as any to look.

rows.label: bf11130100_0210
rows.name: You're hoping we might find him there?

rows.label: bf11130100_0220
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: bf11130100_0230
rows.name: That sounds too easy...

rows.label: bf11130100_0240
rows.name: We go to the village of Trigo to find Metsu.

rows.label: bf11130100_0245
rows.name: And you go to Trigo to find your mother.

rows.label: bf11130100_0250
rows.name: Everybody wins.

rows.label: bf11130100_0260
rows.name: And once I've found my mother, I join up with you?

rows.label: bf11130100_0270
rows.name: Mhm. That's the general idea.

rows.label: bf11130100_0280
rows.name: I'll send my people to notify your mercenary friends.

rows.label: bf11130100_0290
rows.name:
And perhaps we could find a place for
your mother in the capital?

rows.label: bf11130100_0300
rows.name: It should be safe there.

rows.label: bf11130100_0310
rows.name: Is this normal princely behavior?

rows.label: bf11130100_0320
rows.name: You think this is bad, just stick around for a bit.

rows.label: bf11130100_0330
rows.name:
Nobody's, like, making you come along,
you know?

rows.label: bf11130100_0340
rows.name:
Unfortunately, a Driver and Blade are one
in body and soul.

rows.label: bf11130100_0350
rows.name: As if you don't do whatever you feel like anyway...

rows.label: bf11130100_0360
rows.name: I know this is all very sudden.

rows.label: bf11130100_0370
rows.name:
Still, we don't know where we'll run
into Metsu next.

rows.label: bf11130100_0380
rows.name:
It makes sense to stick together 
as much as we can.
